info.title: LocationsForMove
info.description: The LocationsForMove resource represents the locations that a fulfillment order can potentially move to.

paths.description:
Retrieves a list of locations that a fulfillment order can potentially move to.
          The resulting list is sorted alphabetically in ascending order by location name.
paths.summary: Retrieves a list of locations that a fulfillment order can potentially move to.

parameters.name: fulfillment_order_id
parameters.description: The ID of the fulfillment order.

200.description: Retrieves a list of locations that a fulfillment order can potentially move to.

locations_for_move.message: No items are stocked at this location.

response.body: {"locations_for_move":[{"location":{"id":1072404544,"name":"Alpha Location"},"message":"Current location.","movable":false},{"location":{"id":1072404545,"name":"Bravo Location"},"message":"No items are stocked at this location.","movable":false}]}

x-examples.name: Retrieve a list of locations that a fulfillment order can potentially move to.

codeSamples.example_code:
test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
)

ShopifyAPI::LocationsForMove.all(
  session: test_session,
  fulfillment_order_id: 1046000829,
)

properties.description:
A list of locations that a fulfillment order can potentially move to.

  • location: The location being considered as the fulfillment order's new assigned location.
  • movable: Whether the fulfillment order can be moved to the location.
  • message: A human-readable string with the reason why the fulfillment order, or some of its line items, can't be moved to the location.

example.message: Shirt - Medium can't be changed because it isn't stocked at this location.
No items are stocked at this location.
2 items can't be changed because they aren't stocked at this location.

properties.name: locations_for_move

x-shopify-meta.meta_description: View the locations that a fulfillment order can potentially move to.
